info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:01PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Elbert County through 530 PM EDT... At 501 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Elberton, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elberton, Middleton, Dewy Rose, Sweet City and Fortsonia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
